definitions.text: the act of delivering or distributing something (as goods or mail)
examples: his reluctant delivery of bad news

definitions.text: your characteristic style or manner of expressing yourself orally
examples: his manner of speaking was quite abrupt
her speech was barren of southernisms
I detected a slight accent in his speech

definitions.text: the voluntary transfer of something (title or possession) from one party to another
(baseball) the act of throwing a baseball by a pitcher to a batter
recovery or preservation from loss or danger
examples: work is the deliverance of mankind
a surgeon's job is the saving of lives

definitions.text: the act of delivering a child
